article_title: Medicare Cuts, Other Costs Send Aurora to Restructuring Advisers
article_text:
A closely held health-care company has enlisted restructuring advisers to help it face challenges posed by reductions in Medicare reimbursements and a high debt load, people familiar with the matter said.

Aurora Diagnostics Holdings LLC, which provides diagnostic and information services to physicians, hospital systems and researchers, tapped bankers at Evercore Partners and is in talks with restructuring lawyers at Kirkland &...
